import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update part"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/parts/{PartId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing part record. If the part does not exist, it will be created (upsert behavior).

**Prerequisites**
1. **PartId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/parts](/docs/api/parts/list-parts) or [POST /api/v1.0/parts/search](/docs/api/parts/search-parts) to find the target part, extract `Items[].PartId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Find part: [GET /api/v1.0/parts](/docs/api/parts/list-parts) or [POST /api/v1.0/parts/search](/docs/api/parts/search-parts).
2. Update part: [POST /api/v1.0/parts/\{PartId\}](/docs/api/parts/update-part) with new values.
3. Verify changes: [GET /api/v1.0/parts/\{PartId\}](/docs/api/parts/get-part-by-id).

**Updatable Fields**: Name, StandardCostEach, StandardSupplierId, QuantityOnHand.

**Minimal Required Fields**: PartId (path).

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"PartId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"Unique identifier of the part to update.","schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"description":"Updated part data.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Represents a part in the legacy parts management system.","properties":{"PartId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the part."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site this part belongs to."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product module identifier."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date and time the part was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date and time the part was last modified."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the part."},"StandardCostEach":{"type":"number","format":"decimal","description":"Standard unit cost for the part."},"StandardSupplierId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"UUID of the default supplier for this part."},"StandardSupplier":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Represents a supplier in the legacy parts management system.","properties":{"PartSupplierId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the part supplier."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site this supplier belongs to."},"ProductId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Product module identifier."},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date and time the supplier was created."},"ModifiedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"Date and time the supplier was last modified."},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Display name of the supplier."},"AddressId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"UUID of the associated address."},"Address":{"allOf":[{"type":"object","description":"Physical mailing address","properties":{"AddressId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Unique identifier for the address"},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site this address belongs to"},"Street1":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Primary street address line"},"Street2":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Secondary address line (suite, building, etc.)"},"City":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"City name"},"State":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"State or province when the address was last modified"}},"required":["AddressId"],"title":"Address"}],"description":"Expanded address details.","nullable":true,"type":"object"}},"title":"PartSupplier"}],"description":"Expanded default supplier details.","nullable":true,"type":"object"},"QuantityOnHand":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Current stock quantity on hand."}},"title":"Part"},"example":{"Name":"Chromebook Keyboard","StandardCostEach":25.5,"QuantityOnHand":100}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
